clearStress.description: Describe how you blow off steam or pull yourself together, and clear all marked Estrés.
clearStress.name: Eliminar Estrés

prepare.description: Describe how you are preparing for the next day's adventure, then gain a Esperanza. If you choose to Prepare with one or more members of your party, you may each take two Esperanza.
prepare.name: Prepare

repairArmor.description: Describe how you spend time repairing your armor and clear all of its Espacios de armadura. You may also do this to an ally's armor instead.
repairArmor.name: Repair Armadura

tendToWounds.description: Describe how you patch yourself up and remove all marked Puntos de Golpe. You may also do this on an ally instead.
tendToWounds.name: Curar heridas

workOnAProject.description: Establish or continue work on a project.
workOnAProject.name: Trabajar en un proyecto

clearStress.description: Describe how you blow off steam or pull yourself together, then clear a number of Estrés equal to 1d4 + your tier.
clearStress.name: Eliminar Estrés

prepare.description: Describe how you prepare yourself for the path ahead, then gain a Esperanza. If you choose to Prepare with one or more members of your party, you each gain 2 Esperanza.
prepare.name: Prepare

repairArmor.description: Describe how you quickly repair your armor, then clear a number of Espacios de armadura equal to 1d4 + your tier. You can do this to an ally's armor instead.
repairArmor.name: Repair Armadura

tendToWounds.description: Describe how you hastily patch yourself up, then clear a number of Puntos de Golpe equal to 1d4 + your tier. You can do this to an ally instead.
tendToWounds.name: Curar heridas

armored.description: When your companion takes damage, you can mark one of your Espacios de armadura instead of marking one of their Estrés.
armored.name: Armored

bonded.description: When you mark your last Punto de Golpe, your companion rushes to your side to comfort you. Tirada a number of d6s equal to the unmarked Estrés slots they have and mark them. If Cualquiera roll a 6, your companion helps you up. Clear your last Punto de Golpe and return to the scene.
bonded.name: Bonded

creatureComfort.description: Once per rest, when you take time during a quiet moment to give your companion love and attention, you can gain a Esperanza or you can both clear a Estrés.
creatureComfort.name: Creature Comfort

choiceDescriptions.attributes: Gain a +1 bonus to two unmarked character traits and mark them.

choiceDescriptions.subclass: Tomar an upgraded subclass card. Then cross out the multiclass option for this tier.

minion.description: For every X damage a PC deals to this adversary, they also deal 1 HP to an additional minion within their attack’s range.
minion.name: Minion
minion.tip: The Minion move is useful when you want to drop lots of small enemies into the battlefield, knowing the party can swing through them very easily. This move means that if a PC hits one minion and they do enough damage, they also hit a number of others that are in range for them. Because of this, it’s often best to have minions crowd a PC–it will feel overwhelming and dangerous until they’re able to make an attack against them. If you want that cinematic feeling of the PCs taking out waves of enemies with a single attack roll, minions are a great tool to make that happen.

relentless.description: A foe with Relentless can activate up to X times during a DJ move so long as there are enough action tokens.
relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.tip: The Relentless move is useful if you want an adversary you can activate more than once during a single DJ move. This is often best for exceedingly fast or dangerous foes, or for adversaries who are likely to be battling the party on their own.

slow.description: A foe with Slow costs X action tokens to activate.
slow.name: Slow
slow.tip: The Slow move is useful if you want an adversary who narratively takes longer to act than others, like a slug creature or a massive ogre. This is usually most effective when that creature is very powerful when it does act, but eats up lots of action tokens to do it.

horde.description: A Horde represents a number of foes working in a group.
horde.label: Horde

leader.description: Adversarios that command and summon other adversaries.
leader.label: Leader

minion.description: Basic enemies that are easily dispatched but dangerous in numbers.
minion.label: Minion

ranged.description: Adversarios that attack from a distance.

quiet.description: You gain a +2 bonus to rolls you make to move silently.

shift.description: When you are targeted for an attack, you can mark an Armadura Slot to give the attack roll against you disadvantage.

shifting.description: When you are targeted for an attack, you can mark an Armadura Slot to give the attack roll against you disadvantage.

truthseeking.description: This armor glows when another creature within Cerca range tells a lie.

truthseeking.description: This armor glows when another creature within Cerca range tells a lie.

hidden.description:
While Oculto, attacks cannot be made directly targeting them nd Cualquiera rolls against them are at disadvantage.
When a Oculto creature moves or attacks, they are no longer Oculto. However, if a creature is Oculto when they begin making an attack, the roll has advantage; the Oculto condition isn’t cleared until after the attack is resolved.
hidden.name: Oculto

restrained.description:
When an effect makes a creature Restringido, it means they cannot move until this condition is cleared.
They can still take actions from their current position.
restrained.name: Restringido

unconcious.description: Your character can’t move or act while unconscious, they can’t be targeted by an attack.
unconcious.name: Unconcious

vulnerable.description:
While a creature is Vulnerable, all rolls targeting them have advantage.
A creature who is already Vulnerable can’t be made to take the condition again.
vulnerable.name: Vulnerable

avoidDeath.description: You drop unconscious temporarily and work with the DJ to describe how the situation gets much worse because of it. Then roll your dado de Miedo; if its value is equal to or under your Nivel, take a Scar.
avoidDeath.name: Avoid Death

blazeOfGlory.description: With Blaze of Glory, the player is accepting death for the character. Tomar one action (at DJ discretion), which becomes an automatic critical success, then cross through the veil of death.
blazeOfGlory.name: Blaze Of Glory

riskItAll.description: Tirada your Dualidad Dados. If Esperanza is higher, you stay on your feet and clear an amount of Puntos de Golpe and/or Estrés equal to the value of the dado de Esperanza (divide the dado de Esperanza value up between these however you’d prefer). If your dado de Miedo is higher, you cross through the veil of death. If the Dualidad Dados are tied, you stay on your feet and clear all Puntos de Golpe and Estrés.
riskItAll.name: Risk It Todo

close.description: means a distance where one can see prominent details of a target-- across a room or to a neighboring market stall, generally about 10-30 feet away. While in danger, a PC can usually get to Cualquierathing that’s close as part of Cualquiera other action they take. Cualquierathing on a battle map that is within the length of a standard pen or pencil (~5-6 inches) can usually be considered close.
close.name: Cerca

far.description: means a distance where one can see the appearance of a person or object, but probably not in great detail-- across a small battlefield or down a large corridor. This is usually about 30-100 feet away. While under danger, a PC will likely have to make an Agilidad check to get here safely. Cualquierathing on a battle map that is within the length of a standard piece of paper (~10-11 inches) can usually be considered far.
far.name: Lejos

melee.description: means a character is within touching distance of the target. PCs can generally touch targets up to a few feet away from them, but melee range may be greater for especially large NPCs.
melee.name: Cuerpo a Cuerpo

veryClose.description: means a distance where one can see fine details of a target- within moments of reaching, if need be. This is usually Cualquierawhere from about 5-10 feet away. While in danger, a PC can usually get to Cualquierathing that’s very close as part of Cualquiera other action they take. Cualquierathing on a battle map that is within the shortest length of a game card (~2-3 inches) can usually be considered very close.
veryClose.name: Muy cercano

veryFar.description: means a distance where you can see the shape of a person or object, but probably not make outCualquiera details-- across a large battlefield or down a long street, generally about 100-300 feet away. While under danger, a PC likely has to make an Agilidad check to get here safely. Cualquierathing on a battle map that is beyond far distance, but still within sight of the characters can usually be considered very far.
veryFar.name: Muy lejano

magicalImmunity.hint: Immune to Magical Daño if this is set to 1
magicalImmunity.label: Daño Inmunidad: Magical

magicalReduction.hint: Magical Daño is reduced by the amount set here
magicalReduction.label: Daño Reduction: Magical

magicalResistance.hint: Magical Daño is halved if this is set to 1
magicalResistance.label: Daño Resistencia: Magical

physicalImmunity.hint: Immune to Physical Daño if this is set to 1
physicalImmunity.label: Daño Inmunidad: Physical

physicalReduction.hint: Physical Daño is reduced by the amount set here
physicalReduction.label: Daño Reduction: Physical

physicalResistance.hint: Physical Daño is halved if this is set to 1
physicalResistance.label: Daño Resistencia: Physical

arcana.description: This is the domain of the innate or instinctual use of magic. Those who walk this path tap into the raw, enigmatic forces of the realms to manipulate both the elements and their own energy. Arcana offers wielders a volatile power, but it is incredibly potent when correctly channeled.
arcana.label: Arcana

blade.description: This is the domain of those who dedicate their lives to the mastery of weapons. Whether by blade, bow, or perhaps a more specialized arm, those who follow this path have the skill to cut short the lives of others. Blade requires study and dedication from its followers, in exchange for inexorable power over death.
blade.label: Blade

bone.description: This is the domain of mastery of swiftness and tactical mastery. Practitioners of this domain have an uncanny control over their own physical abilities, and an eye for predicting the behaviors of others in combat. Bone grants its adherents unparalleled understanding of bodies and their movements in exchange for diligent training.
bone.label: Bone

codex.description: This is the domain of intensive magical study. Those who seek magical knowledge turn to the recipes of power recorded in books, on scrolls, etched into walls, or tattooed on bodies. Codex offers a commanding and versatile understanding of magic to those devotees who are willing to seek beyond the common knowledge.
codex.label: Codex

grace.description: This is the domain of charisma. Through rapturous storytelling, clever charm, or a shroud of lies, those who channel this power define the realities of their adversaries, bending perception to their will. Grace offers its wielders raw magnetism and mastery over language.
grace.label: Grace

midnight.description: This is the domain of shadows and secrecy. Whether by clever tricks, or cloak of night those who channel these forces are practiced in that art of obscurity and there is nothing hidden they cannot reach. Midnight offers practitioners the incredible power to control and create enigmas.
midnight.label: Midnight

sage.description: This is the domain of the natural world. Those who walk this path tap into the unfettered power of the earth and its creatures to unleash raw magic. Sage grants its adherents the vitality of a blooming flower and ferocity of a hungry predator.
sage.label: Sage

splendor.description: This is the domain of life. Through this magic, followers gain the ability to heal, though such power also grants the wielder some control over death. Splendor offers its disciples the magnificent ability to both give and end life.
splendor.label: Splendor

valor.description: This is the domain of protection. Whether through attack or defense, those who choose this discipline channel formidable strength to protect their allies in battle. Valor offers great power to those who raise their shield in defense of others.
valor.label: Valor

dice.hint: Index for the damage dice used on the basic attack. 0=d4, 1=d6, 2=d8, 3=d10, 4=d12, 5=d20
dice.label: Base Ataque: Daño Dados Index

increasePerArmorMark.hint: A used armor slot normally reduces damage by one step. This value increases the number of steps damage is reduced by.
increasePerArmorMark.label: Daño Reduction per Armadura Slot

maxArmorMarkedStress.hint: If this value is set you can use up to that much stress to spend additional Armadura Marks beyond your normal maximum.
maxArmorMarkedStress.label: Máximo Armadura Usard With Estrés

any.hint: The cost in stress you can pay to reduce incoming damage down one threshold
any.label: Estrés Daño Reduction: Cualquiera

major.hint: The cost in stress you can pay to reduce major damage down to minor.
major.label: Estrés Daño Reduction: Mayor

minor.hint: The cost in stress you can pay to reduce minor damage to none.
minor.label: Estrés Daño Reduction: Leve

severe.hint: The cost in stress you can pay to reduce severe damage down to major.
severe.label: Estrés Daño Reduction: Grave

hordeDamage.hint: Automatically active horde effect to lower damage when reaching half or lower HP.

levelupAuto.hint: When you've made your choices and finish levelup, the numerical changes are automatically applied to your character.

playerCanEditSheet.hint: Jugadores are allowed to access the manual Personaje Ajustes and change their statistics beyond the rules.
playerCanEditSheet.label: Jugadores Can Manually Editar Personaje Ajustes

resourceScrollTexts.hint: When a character is damaged, uses armor etc, a scrolling text will briefly appear by the token to signify this.
resourceScrollTexts.label: Show Resource Change Scrolltexts

maxLoadout.hint: Set to blank or 0 for unlimited maximum
maxLoadout.label: Máximo Cards in Equipamiento
